ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: not(isblank( Branch_Client_Number__c )) && BEGINS( Branch_Client_Number__c ,"0") || MID( Branch_Client_Number__c , 2,1)<>"-" && MID(Branch_Client_Number__c, 3,1)<>"-" && MID(Branch_Client_Number__c, 4,1)<>"-" && MID(Branch_Client_Number__c, 5,1)<>"-" && not(isblank( Branch_Client_Number__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** Format must be : location-client number **** Can not contain leading zeroes example: 50-67890345
